entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
